entry.title: Prototypes
entry.content: A prototype is nothing more than a proof of concept. Neural Voice Puppetry: Audio-driven Facial Reenactment[Justus et al] (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer0"),"loop":true,"preload":"auto","video":{"url":"/uploads/Justus_et_al.mp4"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})() 语音驱动下的虚拟人拟合项目[Qian et al] (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer1"),"loop":true,"preload":"auto","video":{"url":"/uploads/Qian_et_al_align baseline.mp4"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})() 3D目标检测项目 下面的视频demo来自MV3D[chen et al]. 独立在 RPN 阶段实现 Region Attention 模块并构建 Roi-Level 的 GNN 网络， 将SA-SSD 模型的车辆检测精度从 79.77%提升到80.63%。截至 2020/5/28 日，在自动驾驶标准数据KITTI Benchmark上排名第二Link[2/205] (function(){var player = new DPlayer({"container":document.getElementById("dplayer2"),"loop":true,"preload":"auto","video":{"url":"/uploads/MV3D_chen_et_al.mp4"}});window.dplayers||(window.dplayers=[]);window.dplayers.push(player);})()
